metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16777 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: Versions of the npm CLI prior to 6.13.4 are vulnerable to an Arbitrary FileOverwrite. It fails to prevent existing globally-installed binaries to beoverwritten by other package installations. For example, if a package wasinstalled globally and created a serve binary, any subsequent installs ofpackages that also create a serve binary would overwrite the previous servebinary. This behavior is still allowed in local installations and alsothrough install scripts. This vulnerability bypasses a user using the--ignore-scripts install option.

criterions.comment: npm package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
